text: The Breach is a 1970 French Italian Belgian thriller movie directed by Claude Chabrol (who also stars) and was based on the novel The Balloon Man by Charlotte Armstrong. It stars St√©phane Audran, Jean-Pierre Cassel, Michel Bouquet, Annie Cordy, Jean-Claude Drouot, Jean Carmet, Catherine Rouvel. ==Other websites== * * Category:1970 thriller movies Category:French thriller movies Category:Italian thriller movies Category:Belgian thriller movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Claude Chabrol
title: The Breach (1970 movie)
